markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Shattering Blows](/Feats.aspx?ID=1630) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=18" />
<trait label="Rage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=135" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 111 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your forceful blows shatter objects with ease. While you are raging, your melee Strikes ignore 5 points of an object's Hardness. If you have the devastator class feature, you instead ignore 10 points of an object's Hardness.
name: Shattering Blows
